import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { PublicoService } from "../app/services/publico.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Bienvenido!'; constructor(private servicio:PublicoService){} valor:any = null //this.servicio.getValor(); login():void { this.valor = Math.floor(Math.random() * 100).toString(); this.servicio.setValor(this.valor); } logout():void { this.valor = null; this.servicio.setValor(this.valor); } }

{{valor}}
